Basic Starter.description: A basic starter template for a custom Alexa skill.

API Starter.description: A basic starter template for an Alexa skill that calls an external API.

Attributes Starter.description: A basic starter template for an Alexa skill that shows how to store attributes in DynamoDB using the ASK SDK 2.0.

VideoApp Starter.description: A starter template for an Alexa skill that uses the VideoApp Interface.

Audio Stream Starter.description: A starter template for an Alexa audio streaming skill.

Flash Briefing Starter.description: A starter template for an Alexa flash briefing skill.

Customer Profile API Starter.description: A starter template for Alexa skill that uses the Customer Profile API
